org.bytedeco.leptonica

Class L_BMF

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.leptonica.L_BMF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Name(value="L_Bmf")
 @Properties(inherit=leptonica.class)
public class L_BMF
extends Pointer
    Data structure to hold bitmap fonts and related data
